item.description:
Online and Web service platform is useful for any entrepreneur or business person is essential. The developers of Web Development can make you hassle. Make you over to pay then you expected to pay or it can be very cheap but the service is poor. I try to make a common platform to give you […]

The post Web Consultancy Service appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
Online and Web service platform is useful for any entrepreneur or business person is essential. The developers of Web Development can make you hassle. Make you over to pay then you expected to pay or it can be very cheap but the service is poor.

I try to make a common platform to give you service in Web Design and Development. As a standard service that you can choose and make a decision at an affordable rate.

Make the service description and a price of approx. so that nobody could feel I am overpaying.

What can be the service quality is? You can always claim against me if you can’t get the best service.

I am a Web developer and WordPress expert. You can see my portfolio here:
https://behance.net/farhanmullick

Also, you can see my website and Facebook page below:
Fb page: https://facebook.com/mullickfarhan24

Thanks for reading, if you need any kind of services, please give me a knock.

I appreciate your feedback and remarks on my website. Always try to listen to you even it is not benefitting me, just for understanding customer queries.

The post Web Consultancy Service appeared first on Farhan Mullick.

item.title: People React on Website Choice
item.dc:creator: Farhan Mullick
item.description:
A website is a good way to brand your service, but most people don’t know about responsive design. Attractive target customer and service-oriented website portfolio. Your simple website may behave, 1000+ visitors, every day, if you can brand your services in a qualified way. Maybe you got the chance of an advertisement interval on your […]

The post People React on Website Choice appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
A website is a good way to brand your service, but most people don’t know about responsive design. Attractive target customer and service-oriented website portfolio.
Your simple website may behave, 1000+ visitors, every day, if you can brand your services in a qualified way. Maybe you got the chance of an advertisement interval on your website that makes you earn.
I am not headed towards that way, but a website for service and products categorize according to customer choice is a better way. Now, people are getting smart. They go towards social media and website for your judging your website frequently.
Your service guarantees those persons and creates a positive impact on their choice and preference.

The post People React on Website Choice appeared first on Farhan Mullick.

item.title: আমাদের কেন Digital Marketing দরকার?
item.dc:creator: Farhan Mullick
item.description:
আমাদের #digitalworld যেভাবে আগাচ্ছে, বলা হচ্ছে যে, ২০২৫ এর মধ্যে advertising sector এ প্রায় ৩ গুণ বেশি অর্থ ব্যয় হবে, বাংলাদেশের digital market এ। কারন কি? সহজ বাসায় বলা যাচ্ছে যে, যারা digital native অর্থাৎ যারা ছোট বেলা থেকেই digital product and services দেখে বড় হয়েছে, তারা বাইরে গিয়ে পন্ন কিনার চাইতে digitally অর্ডার দেওয়াতে […]

The post আমাদের কেন Digital Marketing দরকার? appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
আমাদের #digitalworld যেভাবে আগাচ্ছে, বলা হচ্ছে যে, ২০২৫ এর মধ্যে advertising sector এ প্রায় ৩ গুণ বেশি অর্থ ব্যয় হবে, বাংলাদেশের digital market এ।

কারন কি?

সহজ বাসায় বলা যাচ্ছে যে, যারা digital native অর্থাৎ যারা ছোট বেলা থেকেই digital product and services দেখে বড় হয়েছে, তারা বাইরে গিয়ে পন্ন কিনার চাইতে digitally অর্ডার দেওয়াতে স্বাচ্ছন্দ্য fill করবে বেশি।

তাহলে কি সাধারণ মার্কেট থাকবেনা?

সাধারণ মার্কেট অবশ্যই থাকবে, কিন্তু তারা তাদের পন্ন এর সার্ভিস গুলো বেশি তুলে ধরবে, এবং shipping করে digitally বিক্রি করবে।

তাহলে কি করার?

তাই যারা SME বা ছোট খাটো বাবসা করেন বা entrepreneur হতে চান, তাদের অবশ্যই ডিজিটাল সব ধরণের services এর চিন্তা মাথায় রেখেই আগাতে হবে।

The post আমাদের কেন Digital Marketing দরকার? appeared first on Farhan Mullick.

item.title: Ask Yourself “Why do we learn Programming? “
item.dc:creator: Farhan Mullick
item.description:
There have many questions that have been asked ‘Why we learn to program’. So I decided I can share something that may be knowledge sharing and valuable instructions for someone. Coding Journey as a Personal Interest First, you have to make your mind if a coding journey is for your personal interest or for regular […]

The post Ask Yourself “Why do we learn Programming? “ appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
There have many questions that have been asked ‘Why we learn to program’. So I decided I can share something that may be knowledge sharing and valuable instructions for someone.
Coding Journey as a Personal Interest
  • First, you have to make your mind if a coding journey is for your personal interest or for regular income. if you are in a rumor that goes that ‘Web development and Software development’ use to learn for higher-income/salary and job in a multinational company, just stop coding right now. You should feel your own interest to make you eligible as a programmer.
Keep Learning
  • Second, always keep learning. Don’t waste your talent to complete it with a different theme template. It can be good for you if you have an idea about web design but it is very tough to get you to a pick mark where you want to choose yourself you are made of for it. I don’t say it for a framework it’s for theme builder and extra added plugin that you are using.
Steady and Slow Process
  • Third, try to solve the code in a steady and slow process When you are learning you can see someone who knows how to do this and that. Very fast in linked with the database and security protocol installation. Please don’t waste your time to see that, learn the code in your own way.
Maintain Code Structure
  • Finally, always your structure to learn the code. It will make your code simple and easy. For that, you can also build your own framework but it should look your way, and of course, security is a big issue for every programmer.
Make sure you also know the cybersecurity and the ethical hacking process.
So, put up your mind and get back to work. Don’t just say I am good at PHP, I don’t want to learn another language. But say if you want to keen about learning these sorts of coding language can easily make you a problem solver for this kind of application.
Happy coding | Keen to learn | Explore for doing more

The post Ask Yourself “Why do we learn Programming? “ appeared first on Farhan Mullick.

item.title: Web Developer Choice
item.dc:creator: Farhan Mullick
item.description:
A Web developer isn’t working as a software expert. He has some portfolio which is part of software inclusion. But if your development is so specific, you should go to a software developer for your particular solution. So the question arises is it not possible that a web developer doesn’t can able to handle the […]

The post Web Developer Choice appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
A Web developer isn’t working as a software expert. He has some portfolio which is part of software inclusion. But if your development is so specific, you should go to a software developer for your particular solution. So the question arises is it not possible that a web developer doesn’t can able to handle the software? But, don’t judge the same developer who offers you a low cost.
If you need the general website it may need a few days to complete. A general developer you can hire and I admitted I am also in that stage. But for the particular specific solution based on your choice. Preferably you should go to any developer who has also had a vast knowledge about databases. Different platforms such as API integration( XML, JSON), Custom Search Field, Accessible Security Ticket, MVC customization, etc.

The post Web Developer Choice appeared first on Farhan Mullick.

item.title: Web Development Service
item.dc:creator: Farhan Mullick
item.description:
What service you really need that a web developer can do? Identity like (model, brand, celebrity, fan followers) a website with a related domain registration name will help you to follow many people in one end. If you are friendly or knowledgeable, share your thoughts and views with others. You can do it through a […]

The post Web Development Service appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
What service you really need that a web developer can do?
  • Identity like (model, brand, celebrity, fan followers) a website with a related domain registration name will help you to follow many people in one end.
  • If you are friendly or knowledgeable, share your thoughts and views with others. You can do it through a blog website or by making video tutorials
  • Thinking about a portfolio of a website or e-commerce website for business purposes. A developer can help you and give you the core customization you need.
  • For a nonprofitable business or advertise something, the landing page will help you on a low budget.
So, Better not to choose your service easy and fewer price bidders but concentrate on what the developers help you to build and what it could help you for a longer time.

The post Web Development Service appeared first on Farhan Mullick.

item.title: Database Management
item.dc:creator: Farhan Mullick
item.description:
Database management system(DBMS) is really important to find the query. The developers can interlink these queries to their front-end design architecture. So why need to fix some quotations to organize the database:  A database must have a relation with their id with primary and foreign keys  The relation database which has so many repetitive items […]

The post Database Management appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
Database management system(DBMS) is really important to find the query. The developers can interlink these queries to their front-end design architecture. So why need to fix some quotations to organize the database:
  1.  A database must have a relation with their id with primary and foreign keys
  2.  The relation database which has so many repetitive items much consider the separate identity of relationship
  3.  The non-relation database are more popular named as NoSQL and often use with name and description tag for Big Data and Cloud Computing
  4. The repetitive items must have some id, name, and category wise division for the relational database.
  5. Non-relational database that mainly works with real-time database SQL management and works for the deep learning and machine learning ideas and attributes
  6.  An inner join database for the relation of category-based structured SQL database works from the legendary times
The last thing we should know that if any developer doesn’t know about the database structure and items he/she wouldn’t be a good developer whether he is a master of the code or multiple platforms for coding.

The post Database Management appeared first on Farhan Mullick.

item.title: Digital Marketing Advanced
item.dc:creator: Farhan Mullick

item.content:encoded:
Digital Marketing resources aren’t enough to reach the goal. Your dedication and service also depend on advertising and website and make the SEO well. Give the customer a prompt response is also value the services a lot.
  • Advertising and promotion with Google Adsense
  • Facebook promotion includes a lot of traffic to attach with.
  • Website development is a platform to engage with your services
  • SEO is a dynamic tool for link building and blog will give optimism for traffic.
  • Lead collection and digital marketing is the final part to fulfill your digital promotion.

The post Digital Marketing Advanced appeared first on Farhan Mullick.

item.title: SEO Optimization
item.dc:creator: Farhan Mullick
item.description:
SEO optimization is really important when need to Boost up your #website. You can have reach content and interactive images but it also has the right #keyword to have the ranking in search engine The SEO not only focuses not only on the keyword but also on your content #optimization writing. Things you need to […]

The post SEO Optimization appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
SEO optimization is really important when need to Boost up your #website.
You can have reach content and interactive images but it also has the right #keyword to have the ranking in search engine
The SEO not only focuses not only on the keyword but also on your content #optimization writing.
Things you need to think about SEO:
  • On-page and Off-page SEO
  • White & black hat SEO
  • Speed optimization
  • Keyword Research and findings
  • Engineering in different SEO websites
If you want to have a solid investment in online #customers and visitors SEO is the right tool for you.
Some Paid sites have been given for you:
  • Google Adwords
  • Keywords in
  • Uber Suggest
  • Aherfs
  • SEMrush

The post SEO Optimization appeared first on Farhan Mullick.

item.title: Email Marketing with Landing Page
item.dc:creator: Farhan Mullick
item.description:
Did you use a #landingPage in your service? It can use your profile for huge sell and also you can generate a lot of income. Nowadays #google can also give you a free #website_development environment. So, use your potential and make sure that you must use some unique #image for your product or service. Give […]

The post Email Marketing with Landing Page appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
Did you use a #landingPage in your service?
It can use your profile for huge sell and also you can generate a lot of income.
Nowadays #google can also give you a free #website_development environment.
So, use your potential and make sure that you must use some unique #image for your product or service.
Give your effort to develop your #emailMarketing and landing page that can attract #customers.
You can also use your email marketing attached with landing sites that generate a #backlink to your website
Some of the common email marketing templates are:
  • Aweber
  • Mailchimp
  • ConvertKit
  • GetResponse
  • Drip

The post Email Marketing with Landing Page appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
